placer

Class LSE

  • java.lang.Object
    • placer.LSE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.differentiation.MultivariateDifferentiableFunction, org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateFunction

    public class LSE
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.differentiation.MultivariateDifferentiableFunction
    This class implements the objective function interms of Log-Sum-Exponentiations.

    It implements MultivariateDifferentiableFunction from Apache Commons Math package.

    Since:
    2016-08-15
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rathindra Nath Dutta, Arjaita Pal

        Compute the value for the function at the given point using DerivativeStructure.
        Specified by:
        value in interface org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.differentiation.MultivariateDifferentiableFunction
        Parameters:
        point - Point at which the function must be evaluated.
        Returns:
        the function value for the given point.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.math3.exception.MathIllegalArgumentException - if point does not satisfy the function's constraints (wrong dimension, argument out of bound, or unsupported derivative order for example)
